website_summaries.verdict: A trio of delicious Nespresso coffees that range in flavor from strong to balanced. If you like a variety of different brews and strengths, this is the assortment to get.
pros: A popular choice for Nespresso Vertuo owners, as this 30-count pack includes 3 coffee varieties – Stormio, Odacio, and Melozio – that range in strength from strong to medium roasts
A good choice for trying an assortment of the brand's popular coffees
cons: Some boxes arrived containing capsules that were dented and damaged
Melozio may be too mild for those who prefer strong coffee

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited when I ordered these only to open the box and find them damaged. These are too expensive to be damaged. I noticed other customers had this same issue. I am not sure how to contact the seller regarding this. Other than the damage, this product is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged pods
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the pods came like this, seriously disappointed. Also why is the writing on the pods different than on the pods you get from the Nespresso store?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toss that drip brew machine in the trash.
customer_reviews.text: Nespresso has ruined me. I am never going back to drip brew again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This package is a rip off
customer_reviews.text: This package is a rip off. Buy the 10 pack of each for $11 each (total $33) through Amazon and save $11.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Time for a great cuppa!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can get genuine Nespresso capsules delivered for free the next day through Amazon in smaller quantities than the minimum I would have to order through Nespresso directly in order to avoid their shipping charges, not to mention the extra time it would take to arrive. The price is comparable (within a few cents per serving) to Nespresso, and these are the genuine article. I just LOVE my morning (all day!) Nespresso coffee routine. Their coffees and espressos are rich, full bodied, and a joy to prepare. The heart of my "me time"!
customer_reviews.author: debra starr

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Aroma & Flavor!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband received the Nespresso Vertuoline machine for his birthday as well as an assortment of coffee pods. This is the reorder he asked for. He gave up his Keurig & french press for this coffee. He loves these flavors & I love the smell! You can't go wrong with this pack.
customer_reviews.author: wildsurf

customer_reviews.title: Very good! I didnt realize no espresso in here
customer_reviews.text: Very good! I didnt realize no espresso in here...just coffee size.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in ATL

customer_reviews.title: These are not authentic Nespresso pods. I realize there ...
customer_reviews.text: These are not authentic Nespresso pods. I realize there were two different sizes included with the order, however, even when using the same color and size pod I would get a different amount of coffee. Called nespresso who informed me they were knock-offs.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany gannon

customer_reviews.title: SMH
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely some of the best tasting coffee your are going to have, unfortunately really don’t understand what the issue is with the presentation (vendor or company). I have purchased directly from nespresso and it was flawless but it does take a few days so I figured amazon would be quicker, it was but it look like they were all rejected from nespresso. The good thing was the presentation did not affect the taste but some of those pods were questionable if they were even going to work. If you have the time I recommend buying directly but if you are on a bind then this is as good as it gets. Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: TPartida

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for assortment
customer_reviews.text: This is a good selection of strengths, not too extreme on either end of the scale, but with enough difference that you can choose stronger or weaker each day and still enjoy the cup.
customer_reviews.author: LYNNE MASTERS

customer_reviews.title: A Little Overrated for the Money but Still Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: The Nespresso Vertuoline Best Seller Assortment is perfect for when I want to sip a full cup of coffee and not just have a shot of espresso. The flavors provided are seperate and unique, not just different color capsules for what ends tasting like the same coffee as other brands I have tried have. Nespresso has been in the capsule coffee business long enough to have a variety of terrific flavors. They know what they are doing and they do it well. My only complaint and reason for only four stars is the price. At almost a dollar a cup, there are other options that check the quick coffee/espresso box with a better price to quality ratio.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Pinks

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Yeah they're delicious... but damn, they're a rip off! Nespresso should be ashamed of themselves
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Order from another seller
customer_reviews.text: The pods came dented and they also did not seem like they had enough air/contents packed in them. These in particular look like they have been spun because there are circles etched in the bottom. Probably not order from this seller again. Won’t know if the dents will effect the centrifugal brewing. Will update.
customer_reviews.author: Mai Xiong

customer_reviews.title: Nice assortment of stronger varieties
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite assortments, giving a nice selection for the time of day. Odaccio is my favorite for flavor any time of the day and Stormio for the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: SIerra Gray

customer_reviews.title: Delicious coffee
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee machine ever. Makes incredible cappuccinos. I always hated pod machines because they never made what I considered to be decent and hot coffee. The machine that starts with K makes a warm brown beverage but it isn’t coffee. With this Nespresso, you can make coffee that rivals Starbucks. I highly recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Nepresso Assortment Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very nice assortment providing a decent array of coffees. they all have superior taste. I am not a fan of flavored coffees but not their problem. there is one regular coffee not available/
customer_reviews.author: Shamus

customer_reviews.title: Not individually labeled
customer_reviews.text: These capsules are not individually labeled, so if you take them out of the box, so can only identify by color (teal, dark green an gold) I'm guessing this may be an international version meant for non-english speaking countries? Once I put them in my holder, I had no idea, so I just kept these in the cardboard boxes. I didn't care for the taste of these. They were not as full as other capsules I'm used to.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TASTE WAY BETTER THAN PRICEY STARBUCKS !!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these products since I got my Breville Nespresso more than a year ago, yes it is kinda pricey for almost $36 for 30 pods but they taste incredibly delicious- from the time it starts to brew I can inhale it and know I'm in COFFEE HEAVEN !, it starts my mornings just so deliciously right with a big UMPH !!! I justify buying these pods as awarding myself for being an awesome human LOL !!! PLUS/ AND this is a much better, cheaper ( yes it costs actually $1.20 per cup) and way more tastier choice than buying those expensive Starbucks coffee which costs at least $4 -$8 a cup of Starbucks Burnt coffee taste !!!
customer_reviews.author: MaChel NYC

customer_reviews.title: is amazon.com going down? so misleading
customer_reviews.text: please be informed. This item was sold by amaozn.com and under prime, but when you try to return it without even opening it, they force you to contact the manufacturer and give you a contact info which you cannot even use without fully registering with the company. i tired this at work for a couple of days and had serious alelrgic reaction ,stomach and headach so I did not even open it and wished to return thinking it is just each mouse click away. Guess what, it turns out I lost money for nothing. Serious reconsidering being a prime member. Amazon.com, keep your integrity and be honest if something is listed as a third party. don't sell it as your.s
customer_reviews.author: Soo

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: This coffee is a fantastic way to start your day. It feels like you're treating yourself every time you brew a cup. The smell is fantastic and the overall ease of use and presentation can't be beat. I also appreciate Nespresso's efforts to make it easy to recycle the single-use pods. That really makes me much more comfortable buying into this brand. These 3 blends are the workhorses of the whole line given they're in the sweet spot of overall strength of roast. Definitely give these a shot if you're looking for a good place to start!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Fake? Old? Not great 1/3
customer_reviews.text: The only capsules that did not produce stale or burned tasting coffee were the Melozio from this pack. The melozio capsules were also the only ones that were marked the same as the ones that came with the machine (in the sample pack). The green and blue pods looked a little different and were not marked with the typical wording. Will not purchase again. Not sure if these are genuine.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Not the best cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: These Nespresso pods are the exact ones sold by Nespresso. Same price, free shipping so why not get the amazon prime points. The Vertuo line, however, is not the best cup of coffee out there and is a bit disappointing from Nespresso. The coffee is brassy and bitter, no matter the variety. Their classic espresso machine does a much better job. And with all that foam, one has to wonder if theres a frothing agent in there.
customer_reviews.author: PhillipAB

customer_reviews.title: A great starter pack for those that don't know what they want
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the perfect variety packs for anyone with a new Nespresso, because it has a variety of medium and dark roasts pods, but doesn't commit you to too many like some of their variety packs with 40 or 50 pods. It comes with their best-tasting dark flavor - Stormio, and probably their second best medium roast - Melozio. I really like that Nespresso gives their roasts an intensity level. Even though their flavor names aren't completely transparent, the intensity level makes it easy to see that Odacio is a medium intensity right in between Stormio and Melozio.
customer_reviews.author: Jacopo

customer_reviews.title: Fast option if you have a nespresso machine.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these from Amazon instead of Nespresso since Amazon could deliver much faster! The only down side is I can not get a free recycle bag unless I order items direct from Nespresso. Love their coffee, but it is a bit pricey (same cost if ordered from Amazon as Nespresso). So I use this as my luxury coffee limiting my self to 4 or 5 per week while making regular brewed coffee on another machine for everyday drinking or follow up cups! I only took away one start due to not being able to get a recycle bag.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Becker

customer_reviews.title: Life without a barista
customer_reviews.text: It’s do-your-own-coffee these days, so better make it as good as you can. Nespresso does that, and the pods are recyclable which I love. Easy to use, the machine tosses the old one into a compartment when you go to add a new pod. Clear out the old pods once a week and take them to a Nespresso store (or maybe recycle on line?? Not sure.) I choose the darkest roast coffee which is strong and bitter, but there are a variety of mellower kinds to pick from. And Amazon Prime gets my replacements here so fast, I don’t have to panic when I am running low.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen H.

customer_reviews.title: Second time this order has been messed up
customer_reviews.text: First time the package was stolen by an Amazon courier (I think). Second time (today), we only got two varieties - the Melozzio and Odacio, missing the Stormio. Not sure WHAT happened but needless to say, be careful ordering this. We haven't had issues with ordering other pods from Amazon but for some reason, this one gives us problems!
customer_reviews.author: Tp

customer_reviews.title: Love my VertuoLine machine
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this machine this past Christmas to try out. We already had the one for the smaller capsules. I like this machine better, the coffee is hotter and the froth is richer and thicker. I also enjoyed the starter pack that came with it. It helped us learn a little more about the coffee and each type. the flavors are not as good as I would think. They are fairly bitter but with the milk from the frothier it is sooo good . I wish there were more types included in the starter pack but overall I am happy and looking forward to trying more flavors.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: The Best Tasting Coffee Out There
customer_reviews.text: This is all some of the best tasting coffee, beautiful rich and bold flavours. I’ve bought this pack multiple times and have no complaints, never been disappointed. The first couple times, admittedly it wasn’t packaged the best and some of the pods were a bit dented, which is no big deal, the pods still work and that doesn’t alter the taste. The packaging has improved since. My only wish is that you could buy all the different Nespresso pods in packs of just 10 to essentially mix & match and make your own variety pack.
customer_reviews.author: The Blue Thunder Bomb

customer_reviews.title: I really like the Green
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Green, I like the Orange but the Blue is just not great. I wish I could buy the flavors I like rather than a forced bundle.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Delicious coffee
customer_reviews.text: Let me start out by saying I despise the taste of all kcups, coffee, tea, hot chocolate, they all have this gross taste to it. I bought the nespresso my my boyfriend as a Christmas gift and bought these with it. I LOVE THESE!!! they taste amazing and we've bought more of them, I drink them more than he does which i wasnt at all expecting!
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: A nice assortment of medium brews
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fresh and the expiration dates are so far away I don't have to worry. The boxes they come in are even high-end. All 3 strengths are the perfect roast. My only complaint is these are so much pricier than k-cups, but they also taste much better than any k-cup I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Nacho Libra

customer_reviews.title: So delicious
customer_reviews.text: Buying a Nespresso has been the best investment ever. I fee bad about all the pods and waste but they offer a recycling program 🙌🙌 All the flavors in this pack are delicious. Intensity ranging from 6 to 8. My favorite is by far the 6. My mom visited during my maternity leave and she drank one every morning. She wiped out my stash! 😂 it’s that good. I am a costumer for as long as they continue offering coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Alkalina

customer_reviews.title: Nespresso is hands-down the best coffee
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee out there! My husband got me a new Nespresso machine for Christmas so I had to order these capsules a few days ahead of time, so I'd be prepared to make some coffee immediately; I didn't know the machine he got me already came with some sample capsules. For those of you that are questioning these capsules being authentic or not due to the logo, I can tell you they are, the capsules that came with my new Nespresso machine have the exact same logo (see the photos).
customer_reviews.author: LifestylebyFrancesca

customer_reviews.title: They all taste the same, and you're too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I've belonged to the Nespresso club for almost a year now, it is so expensive and the flavor is not that big of a deal. Half the coffee's you can't even tell the difference in taste. I buy it because my wife likes it but if it was up to me I would get rid of it. The delivery system is terrible it takes too long to get your order. Sometimes my orders are damaged and I don't bother calling to cry about it. It is not that big of a deal the nespresso club. I'd rather buy coffee by beans grind them myself and put them in a coffee press
customer_reviews.author: Sam Falbo

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the wrong thing, but will use for lattes.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t read the description correctly. I thought these were espresso pods for my new Nespresso machine. They are regular coffee, not espresso. And they’re strong, even for me, and I like a big bold flavor. They almost taste like instant coffee, which I loathe. My solution was to make lattes out of them, and that works for me. I had to order espresso pods right away, though. I’ll use these for lattes, and will take them as my to-go cups on my way to work. Like I said, my mistake, but they are really strong for a regular daily coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy007

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dark roast variety pack, arrived on time and in perfect shape
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of darker roasts, arrived on time, expiration dates were appropriately far away (around one year). No complaints. Pods are expensive but prices here (at the time of my purchase) were competitive with other sellers.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flavors. Stormio was too strong
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flavors and quality. The only thing that I couldn’t handle was the strength of the Stormio. I got nausea and had to throw up. I barely made it to half a cup before I started feeling sick. I’m going to stick to the other milder flavors and the expressso pods so it’s strength in smaller portions. Hopefully one day I can build up to the Stormio because the flavor is very strong and bold
customer_reviews.author: Diamonds and Pearls

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee, outrageously pricing.
customer_reviews.text: Th coffee is great, and the process is simple and convenient. That said, you'll pay more than $1.00 for each cup you brew at home, as compared to 10 to 30 cents with any other single serve coffee maker. Nespresso has a monopoly on the "pods" by virtue (no pun intended) of a patent that bars anyone else from making pods that fit the virtuo machines. Great coffee, but think twice.
customer_reviews.author: spac

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee!
customer_reviews.text: No more Starbucks and a touch of luxury at home. Best coffee of all the single serve brands. These capsules make 7.8 oz but the stronger Stormio can be run twice to make a larger cup like the Alto size 14 oz. The price difference between the 7.8 oz ($1.10) and 14 oz ($1.20) capsules is 10 cents but if your out of the Alto is works in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S

customer_reviews.title: Way too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Way too expensive and some coffees taste like cardboard. $$ especially if you drink more than one cup a day. I bought a bag of Starbucks to use with the replacement foils. I got around 48 cups for $13, and the cheapest Nespresso pods were $1 a piece, you do the math🤔 I purchased the Nespresso for convenience and this was anything but. I ended up sending everything back for full refund.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyStephens

customer_reviews.title: The coffee
customer_reviews.text: The Coffee capsules are different: the flavor of the coffee is very weak and very little coffee goes in the cup. The packaging was different the capsules are loose in the package which is not the norm for this special coffee I am disappointed in the weak coffee even Stormio, melozio should be a stronger coffee and it is weaker then The Keig coffee. The coffee is very high in price. I believe that another seller weakened the coffee capsules I will not buy them through Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie Jean Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive 3 different types of coffee as promised.  Only Melozio
customer_reviews.text: This came overnight - and was delivered on a Sunday. I appreciated the quick delivery, but was dissapointed when I opened the box. Only one of three types of pods was delivered: Melozio. This is the weakest of the three, and my least favorite. :( Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: J. deRosier

customer_reviews.title: Illogical variety
customer_reviews.text: Product quality is fine, but the flavor varieties in the combination do not make sense. The green and blue are almost identical, strong-flavorful, and the tan is very, very ,mild. The small size espresso shot (dark blue) is by far the best variety and the green is the closest one to that in a full size. Why Nespresso does not make the espresso shot variety in a full size is beyond me! The tan variety is not worth $1.10 each.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Rhoads

customer_reviews.title: Check your packaging.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve ordered these. They taste great and the delivery is quick and convenient. I did not have a problem with my first order. Unfortunately this time the Melozio sleeve was open and 7 of the 10 pods were smashed. The other two sleeves in the box were fine. I’m not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kthorny

customer_reviews.title: Better than ANY coffee shop 🤪
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my Nespersso coffee maker for almost a year now and for me this three variety package does the trick. Easy to order fast delivery no hassle! Just another update: I can’t get over how fantastic this Vertuoline coffee is. I’ve even tried refilling the capsules with my own coffee but can’t achieve the quality of Nespresso Vertuoline!
customer_reviews.author: Noel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: The Nespresso machine is super simply to use and the coffee is delicious. You do have to use specialty pods, but at one dollar a piece it is way cheaper than a coffee house. This machine can even detect when the pod you are using is for an espresso or coffee blend and automatically adjust the amount of water during brewing. Makes an awesome crema to boot. This machine is in my office at work and we all enjoy better coffee now.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mandrake

customer_reviews.title: Great combo!
customer_reviews.text: I liked all of these flavors. They are strong enough for my taste. I didn't think that I wanted a Nespresso because each cup is rather expensive, but it is so good. I try to reserve these for my weekend coffees since they are so good. I'm really getting spoiled.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fike

customer_reviews.title: soso
customer_reviews.text: ordered these capsules for their coffee machine. I don't understand why the coffee turns out so bitter. Is that coffee in them? Or is my coffee machine not working properly? I drank this coffee in the office with friends, a completely different taste!
customer_reviews.author: Viacheslav N.

customer_reviews.title: great coffee selection
customer_reviews.text: from decaf (useless for me) to a 10 intensity coffee, really well worth price difference with other container cup coffees. They may have more recognizeable brands but you cant taste marketing of brands...this is pure coffee flavor at its best
customer_reviews.author: alex g llorente

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment—could be better.
customer_reviews.text: We used to buy Nespresso pods via their website, typically getting a variety of light, medium, and heavy caffeine strengths. While all of these pods were in the rotation, there is no medium option. It would be nice if they offered one with all three. That said/reiterating a bit, we thoroughly enjoy all of these.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wilson

customer_reviews.title: box and contents came damaged
customer_reviews.text: this was my second time purchasing this product. the box and the pods came damaged. i will be returning if it doesn't work in the machine. disappointing considering the high cost of the pods
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Luxury cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Nepresso machine and pods for weekend indulgence when I am not commuting. But with work-at-home during the COVID-19 crisis, it has been my cup(s) of the day from oat milk creamer in the frother. It's been a great cup of relaxation and sanity. Flavor and enjoyment !!
customer_reviews.author: NSC

customer_reviews.title: The worst ever ,still in my panttry, one month, can't do, nothoing
customer_reviews.text: The worst ever ,still in my panttry, one month passed, and can't do, nothoing,I might use them to make tiramisu, jut to calm my self down for this unexpected loss. Who knows where and how these "beautiful so called coffee capsules" stored!!!! till now I'm disappointed, so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Muhiedin Itani

customer_reviews.title: Was shipped fake pods.
customer_reviews.text: The pods I received were fake. They did no have the name of the coffee or the size of the brew. Does not match authentic pods ordered directly from nespresso.
customer_reviews.author: E. OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Never received
customer_reviews.text: I cannot speak to the product or quality of the coffee since I never received my order. After it was delayed several days then the order said it was delivered even though it was not. Didn’t get to enjoy any Nespresso coffee while I was on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Shahnawaz Hossain

customer_reviews.title: Weird Flavors
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE Nespresso and after experiencing the difference between my vertuo and my old Keurig, I will NOT be going back! However, I will complain that the vertuo pods are much more expensive that the old nespresso pods which is something that should be considered by the company. All that being said, I love a strong coffee and was excited to try these flavors but was sadly underwhelmed. I only enjoyed the gold pods and tried EVERYTHING to enjoy the other flavors from different creamers to almond vs 2% milk- etc. I just found the notes to be too overwhelming for your average morning cup.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for Vertuo pod storage
customer_reviews.text: Great storage for VertuoLine pods. Easily holds espresso and coffee pods (except the alto pods, but I don’t many people who use altos). Some users have mentioned having difficulty loading the final back row. This only occurs if you load the pods front to back. Load back to front—everything fits just fine. For the price, it is sturdy and looks great! Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JLee

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE....
customer_reviews.text: I'll be glad the day another company offers this size pod. I hate to pay the price for these but love the finished product. I have learned to use the cap labels to help stretch out my purchases but are not convenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela L.

customer_reviews.title: Flavor variety nice unless everyone likes the same flavors
customer_reviews.text: - Item was a hit during the holidays as a change of pace from regular coffee. - All the flavors, in the assortment, were very good. - Might be a bit pricey to have on a daily basis but the flavors may make it worth while.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shoji

customer_reviews.title: Are you out of green and blue pods (combo) pack I keep getting yellow !
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this (combo) nespresso pods with the green, blue and yellow pods for 4-5 times now. This most recent time I got all yellow pods . That being my least favorite out of the 3 . Our you out of the green and blue? I did a reorder and got all yellow again ??? Or either your warehouse has the item marked wrong. (UPC??) I have gotten the wrong order twice .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blue/green - good and bold. Gold is VERY WEAK
customer_reviews.text: I like strong, bold coffee. The green and blue colors are OK. The gold color is VERY weak and literally not worth drinking. If you want to drink something that light-tasting, save your $ and just drink tap water.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: They Make Great Coffee Pods...but there is a Cost
customer_reviews.text: I have to have coffee in the morning. It's a must! My buddy bought one of the original Espresso machine which I ultimately bought, but then had to add a Coffee Machine. To me all the K-Cup machines are way too week. I LIKE STRONG COFFEE! If you like strong coffee. Get these cups!
customer_reviews.author: David H. Malin

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and easy coffee. Great value and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first purchase for my nespresso vertió machine and it was an excellent choice! All 3 flavors are delicious hot or iced, they have a good amount of foam and it’s super easy to use. The variety packs are a great way to sample some variety to figure out your preferences. I’m definitely a fan of the melozzio overall!
customer_reviews.author: Camy J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coffee
customer_reviews.text: Of this line, the Stormio (green) is my favorite. If you agree, there's always an option to get 3 sleeves of just Stormio (which I've since done). It's super convenient buying these sleeves on Amazon, but you may get some perks and freebies if you get them directly from Nespresso.
customer_reviews.author: jib jose

customer_reviews.title: Decent and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I like these but I wish there were more combo packs to choose from. I also wish there were reusable packets to fill your own coffee with. The coffee is good though not the strongest, but I like my coffee strong so that may be on me. They’re expensive but that comes with the convenience
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Ordered assortment, received single flavor Melozio
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a "Flavor Assortment" as the description says, but I only received 3-pack of Melozio flavor, which I rather not go through the return/exchange hassle for 2 (other) flavors. I'll just stick with Melozio for now, I guess – and not re-order through them in the future. Otherwise, Nespresso Vertuo coffee pods are amazing in taste and super easy to use. As for Nespresso, I wish they would allow third-party brands to make Vertuo pods like they allow for the classic pods, but of course, this would drive down prices because of competition, which they don't want.
customer_reviews.author: Lusine Papoyan

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!
customer_reviews.text: Due to COVID I was unable to purchase pods from the Nespresso store so I decided to order these pods. I've ordered about 4 of these packs since March with no issues. They tasted great! No problems with the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, and Taste.
customer_reviews.text: Great bargain buying these three. i enjoy my coffee on the strong side so two of the three are perfect, the other medium blend is delicious also, just not as strong. Highly recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Raffaele

customer_reviews.title: Good Amount
customer_reviews.text: I got these for different people to try and it was a good selection of the different kinds of regular coffee you can get through Nespresso. It also made a very smooth cup of coffee that definitely didn't need any cream of sugar added in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi and Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, easy to use. Can only buy product online
customer_reviews.text: I love my espresso machine. It’s great that the coffee gets that Crema, not cream in it. I left off one star because the price of the coffee is really ridiculously expensive. It’s too bad we cannot get the capsules in a store like you can for a Keurig. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Quapaw Woman

customer_reviews.title: Too strong
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with it, just personal preference. The coffee is good but the blue and green pods are both too strong for me, I believe they are rated 8 and 7 in strength. I do like the gold pod which is a 6 and will purchase it again separately.
customer_reviews.author: MrsAJo

customer_reviews.title: Top 3 top 3 top 3
customer_reviews.text: I can drink these just without adding any additional sugar or creamer. These taste awesome
customer_reviews.author: KBazan

customer_reviews.title: Mmmm coffee
customer_reviews.text: I love my Nespresso coffee maker and it's so convenient to be able to order them off Amazon so that I don't have to go to the shop. It costs the same as on their site but NO SHIPPING so it's a win for this coffee lover.
customer_reviews.author: cherry

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra 10 dollars at Nespresso.com
customer_reviews.text: I'm really hoping that I didn't waste money on a Nespresso machine for the pods to be this exclusive and this watered down. I'm ordering directly from Nespresso to ensure quality this month. (not worth the 10 bucks you save by going with Amazon)
customer_reviews.author: Pixel dork

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Coffee
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy drinking this. It’s pricey, and yes I’d like to see it cheaper. This is a fine product, and I can’t imagine a better cup of coffee unless you have an inexpensive expresso machine with quality coffee beans.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Shipping and packing of pods
customer_reviews.text: I purchase the same order, every month or so. They usually come in a sleeve that contains a cardboard separator for the pods. This time, the pods were loose and just thrown into the boxes. Most of them are dented and I’m not very pleased. I hope this doesn’t mean they aren’t “authentic”. There are already pictures here to demo my review. Mine are no different. Love the coffee. Worth the $1.00 per pod! But the shipping was NOT usual or ideal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well pleased with this set
customer_reviews.text: This set of pods is right within my preferred range of strengths from Nespresso. I bought the pack early, anticipating that I might be receiving a Nespresso machine for Christmas, and I have been using it daily since then.
customer_reviews.author: Marcellas M. Prather

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee but...
customer_reviews.text: I got this with a pack (bought a nespresso machine), they arrived in perfect condition, the flavor is great! But just noticed I paid around 15$ for this and if I want to buy more it actually cost 33$! :O that's too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra O'C.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These capsules are better than any k cup coffee I’ve ever tried. Can’t believe we waited so long to get a Nespresso. They are pricey but so worth it if you love a good cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Colclasure

customer_reviews.title: This was not Nespresso
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were surprised to see that the individual containers of coffee were not marked with the Nespresso logo! I'm not sure who manufactured these, but it is obviously not what Nespresso sells---
customer_reviews.author: Mary Howard

customer_reviews.title: Best part of the morning.
customer_reviews.text: Yes a bit on the expensive side but, worth every penny. Great tasting coffees and a nice variety of coffees and expressos. I used to drink two cups every morning and now I find myself drinking one cup because it is so satisfying and rich. AH so so good.
customer_reviews.author: R. Soto

customer_reviews.title: Great but a little spendy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mix of the bolder coffees. Very nice, strong and has a more espresso consistency. I am spoiled by this coffee but pods are unfortunately too expensive to really use daily so we use a mokka pot daily and use this for multiple cups or grab and go.
customer_reviews.author: McJules

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Nespresso Flavors!
customer_reviews.text: Nespresso is Great tasting coffee! It's not especially inexpensive, but less expensive than purchasing coffee from drive thrus. Not to mention, Nespresso is better than most restaurants.
customer_reviews.author: Sblair71

customer_reviews.title: Nespersso Vertuoline Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Really great package with three different assortment of flavors! All very good and great for the price! will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect assortment of coffee for a stronger coffee lover such ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect assortment of coffee for a stronger coffee lover such as myself. I love my new nespresso and will be buying this pack again!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Coffee addiction at it's best
customer_reviews.text: This coffee has made me a better social distancer!!! I don't need to go coffee shops or Starbucks anymore. This is by far exceeds all french press, drip, Keurig...etc Amazing flavors, great quality. With a touch of a button, you look like a pro. I love the smell of a freshly brewed cup in the morning. The only problem i will face after the shelter in place is over, is refusing to socialize at coffee shops when i can recreate an amazing cup of coffee for a portion of the price :))
customer_reviews.author: Nader Awad

customer_reviews.title: Very good selection
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten this bundle at least 2-3 times now. All flavors are good, and reasonably strong too! My only complaint is how expensive it is to keep purchasing this .....
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Amoury

customer_reviews.title: First time trying Nespresso?
customer_reviews.text: If so, give this selection a go. I'm sure you will find a few flavors to reorder. I enjoyed most of the samples, a couple, not so much. It helped me narrow in on what flavors/strengths of coffee or expresso I enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Frank R Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Going to buy again - third time
customer_reviews.text: Almost finished this now - just the right set of coffee pods for the daily first cup - and depending on how tired 3 levels of strength deals with whatever need you have. Will be buying this again many times in the future no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: TKY

customer_reviews.title: Consider long term costs
customer_reviews.text: As advertised >$1 per cup ... imagine taking advantage of that every day in addition to the cost of the machine, maintenance, and effort involved when you decide if you want to buy the machine. The value for the money just isn't' there for me, and if I could get a credit for the return I would do it, reclaim counter space etc, but maybe for others the value is there - hard to tell.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! Nespresso coffees are the best! I’ve never been a fan of single serve coffees and Keurig coffees taste terrible; but nesoresso has made me a convert. Great rich flavors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon247

customer_reviews.title: Good, but expensive.
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is great and these pods work perfectly in my machine. I appreciate that I can buy a smaller quantity from amazon, but I really wish they weren’t so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Expert Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffees for the Milder Coffee Drinker
customer_reviews.text: Yummm. So excited my Breville Nespresso machine came with these three flavors. I was excited to try different roasts and two of the flavors have turned out to be some of the best one-touch coffees I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.author: mazw

customer_reviews.title: Simple and delicious
customer_reviews.text: So happy with these. Someone walks in and I can offer a coffee or cappuccino or express and don’t have to make a pot of coffee. I find myself having afternoon cappuccino. Really love this coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Susan O'

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Have really enjoyed this coffee-I wish someone would make a less expensive pod for these machines. Usually make this for my wife when she wants her coffee. Netspresso has always had consistent quality & I have never been disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: james from Md

customer_reviews.title: Finally accessibility
customer_reviews.text: I had truly put away my nespresso...buying directly from Nespresso was expensive and inconvenient. The actual coffee is quite wonderful. The capsules are recyclable. Now I may purchase much more expeditiously. This combination of coffees is well put together.
customer_reviews.author: andrea treon

customer_reviews.title: Stick with Nespresso website ordering. . . you know what you're getting.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure where these came from but they tasted not so great and almost every capsule had a dent in it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth D. Omalley

customer_reviews.title: Very appealing and good packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging. Tried one so far. Just bought our machine and the one we tried tasted good. We shall see how the other flavors taste.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Nupresso Pods
customer_reviews.text: I love the option of being able to buy the Nupresso pods on Amazon. They’re not readily available at grocery stores so this is a great option! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Barmon

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for the flavor. I tried two of the three flavors included here so far and they’re absolutely delicious (melozio/stormio). The downside is some of the pods came damaged, and I wasn’t sure how to contact Amazon about it... but when I did the return process on the app, they told me I could keep the product still and issued the refund immediately. I am extremely happy about that. It gives me the confidence to order again and give it another shot!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

product_meta.title: Nespresso Capsules VertuoLine, Best Seller Variety Pack, Medium and Dark Roast Coffee, 30 Count Coffee Pods, Brews 7.8 oz
product_meta.description: CONTENTS: STORMIO: A rich & strong coffee blend. Intensity 8. 100% Arabica- Central America Beans ODACIO: A long bold & lively coffee blend. Intensity 7. 100% Arabica- Central America and East Africa Beans MELOZIO: A smooth & balanced coffee blend. Intensity 6. 100% Arabica- South and Central America Beans
feature_bullets: NESPRESSO VERTUOLINE VARIETY PACK ASSORTMENT: This Nespresso coffee assortment offers 30 Nespresso Pods in a variety of 3 best-selling coffee blends for the Nespresso VertuoLine System.10 Stormio, 10 Odacio, 10 Melozio

INTENSITY: This assortment will let you explore the rich tastes of the following Nespresso Capsules: Stormio (Intensity 8), Odacio (Intensity 7) & Melozio (Intensity 6). It's the perfect choice to discover a distinctive range of extraordinary coffees
COFFEE BREWS 7.8 OZ : These Nespresso VertuoLine pods provide you with a 7.8 oz serving of coffee which is perfect for a longer drinking experience

WE RECYCLE: Nespresso aluminum capsules are fully recyclable and guarantee coffee freshness - we provide different options for recycling your used aluminum coffee pods to fulfill our collective commitment to protecting the environment

VERTUOLINE ONLY: Nespresso Vertuo delivers you a full range of cup sizes and coffee styles from espresso to Alto XL with easy to use Nespresso pods. Enjoy hot or pour over ice. (VertuoLine Capsules are not compatible with OriginalLine machines )

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
